EntryName	OCRL_HUMAN
ProteinName	Inositol polyphosphate 5-phosphatase OCRL (EC 3.1.3.36) (EC 3.1.3.56) (Inositol polyphosphate 5-phosphatase OCRL-1) (OCRL-1) (Lowe oculocerebrorenal syndrome protein) (Phosphatidylinositol 3,4,5-triphosphate 5-phosphatase) (EC 3.1.3.86)
GeneName	OCRL OCRL1
Length	893
Function	Catalyzes the hydrolysis of the 5-position phosphate of phosphatidylinositol 4,5-bisphosphate (PtdIns(4,5)P2) and phosphatidylinositol-3,4,5-bisphosphate (PtdIns(3,4,5)P3), with the greatest catalytic activity towards PtdIns(4,5)P2 (PubMed:10764818, PubMed:15474001, PubMed:7761412, PubMed:9430698). Able also to hydrolyze the 5-phosphate of inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate and of inositol 1,3,4,5-tetrakisphosphate (PubMed:25869668, PubMed:7761412). Regulates traffic in the endosomal pathway by regulating the specific pool of phosphatidylinositol 4,5-bisphosphate that is associated with endosomes (PubMed:21971085). Involved in primary cilia assembly (PubMed:22228094, PubMed:22543976). Acts as a regulator of phagocytosis, hydrolyzing PtdIns(4,5)P2 to promote phagosome closure, through attenuation of PI3K signaling (PubMed:22072788).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasmic vesicle; Phagosome membrane; Early endosome membrane; Membrane; Clathrin-coated pit; Cell projection; Cilium; Photoreceptor outer segment; Cell projection; Cilium; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Endosome; Golgi apparatus; trans-Golgi network; Lysosome
